title: Ex Arsenal stars go at it as Robin van Persie is called out by Dusko Tosic’s wife
text:
Ex Arsenal stars go at it as Robin van Persie is called out by Dusko Tosic’s wife By Ben Green on Monday, February 6, 2017 Crazy scenes at Besiktas v Fenerbahce 
A cup match between Besiktas and Fenerbahce was never going to go down quietly but even by the standards of Turkish football, Sunday’s game was really quite something. 
Former Arsenal and Manchester United striker Robin van Persie was the main man in more ways than one throughout a heated encounter at Besiktas. 
RVP scored the only goal of the game on 72 minutes to secure a famous win for Fenerbahce. Oguzhan Ozyakup v Robin van Persie 
Oguzhan Ozyakup and Robin van Persie played together at Arsenal. Whilst the latter was a big star at the club, it is well known that RVP helped Ozyakup in north London as both come from Holland. 
Ozyakup has spoken publicly about his admiration for van Persie and there are even reports that the latter convinced him to leave Arsenal for first team opportunities elsewhere. 
This friendship visibly dissipated on the field during Fenerbahce’s 1-0 win at Besiktas. Van Persie celebrated the winner by sliding in front of Ozyakup. 
After the match Ozyakup said: “I was very good friends with a certain player. That changed today. Sometimes you see the real face of a footballer on the field.” Jelena Karleusa v Robin van Persie 
Meanwhile, off the pitch, there was another battle going on. 
On 41 minutes, Dusko Tosic was sent off for a coming together with Robin van Persie. 
There is absolutely no doubt that RVP dived when Tosic squared up to him. 
On Twitter, Tosic’s wife Jelena Karleusa called out Robin van Persie with a Tweet that has since been deleted.
